data.eml:eml: Two new endophytic Colletotrichum species from Nothapodytespittosporoides in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Sixuan, Qiao, Lijun, Jayawardena, Ruvishika S., Hyde, Kevin D., Xiaoya Ma,, Wen, Tingchi, Kang, Jichuan (2019): Two new endophytic Colletotrichum species from Nothapodytespittosporoides in China. MycoKeys 49: 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.49.31904, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.49.31904
